Question: Got it to install. But I'm running into a problem :(

When i go to Activate it i get a popup called "Autodesk Licensing" but its a white screen with no options. http://i.imgur.com/L1j6k.jpg

Any Ideas? I tried to use the crack to patch it, But it didn't have any affect that I'm aware of.  Says i have 30days remaining.

Any help would be appreciated

^ Problem solved.
Had to Create a New Window's Account and load up 3DSMAX. Was able to see the "Autodesk Licensing" Popup that way.
Help!! I get some message that says; "Please insert the disc: Autodesk 3dsmax  2013. Where is the disk two?

Thanks for this amazing torrent guys. I work as part of a mod team, making mods for PC games. Some mods require precise 3D models, with little room for mistake. With the retail price of this being at over 3000USD, you guys just saved me a lot of money. Thanks, and keep up the good work.
